title: The Instant Feedback System DOES NOT Work
body: This system has absolutely ruined my opinion of this game. Your teammates can sit there and be toxic the entire game and harass you and tell you to kill yourself, but if you threaten to report them or tell them they're being a dick you can be reported too and flagged for it. This is obnoxious. I've thought it for ages but never made a post about it until it actually affected my account. I've gotten a chat restriction and now a ban and literally never said anything worse in a game than "that was retarded" or "stop being toxic". I understand the former could easily be considered offensive, but that isn't as reoccurring as the latter. I'm disappointed in Riot, I'm disappointed in the community, and I probably won't be returning to the game.

And yes, I've progressed through the chat restrictions which I no longer have the logs for but felt the same exact way. I agree that these aren't friendly by any means, but am really surprised that they're bannable when I'd say most of them are responsive to toxic teammates. I guess I just can't get over the fact that you don't consider the situation the player is in when they say things like this. In some of these I had teammates refusing to contribute, trying to make us lose, and harassing other members of my team and yah it totally set me off and I probably should've just muted. Instead I chose to be aggressive and convince the player that they were wrong. In the real world this isn't really a big deal, so why would it ban my account in a video game? This isn't COD, it requires strategy and sometimes harsh criticism is necessary imo. I understand I don't make the rules and reflecting on these logs I do feel shitty like I shouldn't have said some of these things and let it get out of hand. I just can't get over how this is comparable to people dropping the n-bomb and telling people to drink bleach.
